title: Scream for Me (Romantic Suspense, #8) (Daniel Vartanian #2)  by
description:
Special Agent Daniel Vartanian has sworn to find the 
perpetrator of multiple killings that mimic a 13-year-old 
murder linked to a collection of photographs that belonged 
to his brother, Simon, the ruthless serial killer who met 
his demise in DIE FOR ME. Daniel is certain that someone 
even more depraved than his brother committed these crimes, 
and he's determined to bring the current murderer to justice 
and solve the mysterious crime from years ago.

With only a handful of images as a lead, Daniel's search will 
lead him back through the dark past of his own family, and 
into the realm of a mind more sinister than he could ever 
imagine. But his quest will also draw him to Alex Fallon, a 
beautiful nurse whose troubled past reflects his own. As Daniel 
becomes attached to Alex, he discovers that she is also the 
object of the obsessed murderer. Soon, he will not only be 
racing to discover the identity of this macabre criminal, but 
also to save the life of the woman he has begun to love.

 
Scream for Me (Romantic Suspense, #8) (Daniel Vartanian #2)
by Karen Rose            
Language: EN
Pages: EPUB 837
